title: The Sting
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
Best Music, Scoring Original Song Score and/or Adaptation
description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con on a mob boss in 1930s Chicago.

title: The Exorcist
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

title: American Graffiti
description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

title: Paper Moon
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

title: Serpico
description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

title: Badlands
description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

title: Mean Streets
description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob while dealing with his reckless friend.

title: The Long Goodbye
description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend cross the border to Mexico, only to become implicated in the murder of his friend's wife.

title: Enter the Dragon
description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament as cover.

title: The Way We Were
description: Two desperate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

title: High Plains Drifter
description: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

title: Papillon
description: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

title: Sleeper
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: A nerdish store owner is cryogenically frozen in 1973 and defrosted 200 years later in a totalitarian police state.

title: Day for Night
description: A committed movie director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

title: Don't Look Now
description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

title: The Wicker Man
description: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the locals claim never existed.

title: Westworld
description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

title: Live and Let Die
description: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

title: Robin Hood
description: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

title: Fantastic Planet
description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

title: The Spirit of the Beehive
description: In a small Spanish village in 1940, a young girl becomes obsessed with the movie "Frankenstein" and the monster.

title: The Holy Mountain
description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

title: Soylent Green
description: In the world of 2022, the population has grown to 40 million people in New York City alone. Most housing is dilapidated and overcrowded, and the homeless fill the streets and line the fire escapes and stairways of buildings.

title: Magnum Force
description: San Francisco Inspector 'Dirty' Harry Callahan is on the trail of a vigilante cop who is killing criminals who have escaped justice.

title: Pat Garrett and Billy the Kid
description: An aging Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman by a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

title: O Lucky Man!
description: The picaresque adventures of a young coffee salesman in Europe.

title: Scarecrow
description: Max is an ex-con who's been saving money to open a car wash in Pittsburgh. Lion is a sailor who's returning to the Midwest to see the child he has never met.

title: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
description: After his last crime operation, Eddie Coyle is looking at a long stretch in prison. He decides to work with the police to expose his organization.

title: Charley Varrick
description: A man, his wife and their friend stage a bloody bank robbery, unaware they are stealing money from the Mob.

title: Sisters
description: A journalist witnesses a murder in a neighboring apartment, but the police do not believe her.

title: World on a Wire
description: A cybernetics engineer uncovers a massive corporate conspiracy involving a computer system capable of simulating a new reality.

title: Touki Bouki
description: A cowherd with a skull-mounted motorcycle and a university student meet in Dakar and plan to escape to Paris.

title: Save the Tiger
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: Harry Stoner is a businessman who is trying to keep his company afloat, but he's struggling with a mid-life crisis and a possible arson conviction.

title: A Touch of Class
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: An American insurance man and a British fashion designer start an affair in London, but their attempt at a romantic getaway in Spain is beset by disasters.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

title: Jesus Christ Superstar
description: Film adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice's rock opera about the final weeks in the life of Jesus Christ.

title: The Mother and the Whore
description: A young man lives in a small apartment with the woman who supports him and has an affair with a promiscuous nurse.

title: Turkish Delight
description: A young sculptor has an erotic and turbulent romance with a young woman.

title: Belladonna of Sadness
description: After being banished from her village, a peasant woman makes a pact with the devil to gain magical abilities.

title: Walking Tall
description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser, who almost single-handedly cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption.

title: White Lightning
description: Gator McKlusky is a moonshine runner who agrees to go undercover for the feds to help them catch the corrupt sheriff who killed his brother.

title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
description: Ten years after a worldwide series of nuclear explosions, Caesar tries to keep the peace between the humans and the apes.

title: Theatre of Blood
description: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

title: The Crazies
description: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

title: Electra Glide in Blue
description: A short Arizona motorcycle cop gets his chance to work in Homicide, only to find that his dream job isn't what he expected.

title: Bang the Drum Slowly
description: A New York baseball club's star pitcher discovers that his catcher and best friend is terminally ill.

title: Emperor of the North
description: During the Great Depression, a hobo battles a sadistic railway conductor who has a reputation for never letting anyone ride his train for free.

title: The Last Detail
description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time before he gets locked up.

title: The Seven-Ups
description: A group of unconventional police officers, known as "The Seven-Ups" for the 7 years prison sentences their arrests usually result in, get into trouble when they go too far.
